title: Fix little bug with run cancellation
First pass at a select statement
rust testcontainer framework
Add note on retry policies for ctx.run
No need for the run future to be `Sync`
body: From a report on Discord, there's no need for run to be `Sync`

title: Make endpoint handle function independent of other handlers
body:
Hi,

I started porting my services from my own [restate-rust-sdk](https://github.com/h7kanna/restate-sdk-rust) to the official SDK.  

To make my transition smooth, I am just making some small restructuring (non breaking).

I do have some useful macros and other utilities like replay aware logger, which I will start slowly contribute to the official SDK.

title: Add MSRV computed with `cargo msrv`
body: Bump toolchain version in CI to 1.81

title: Now a standalone Result can be returned from handlers
body: The final result will be converted to `HandlerResult` anyway.

title: Moved hyper support in a separate module.
body: One can now use the hyper support without necessarily using our server, nor tokio net.

title: All integration tests now pass!
body:
Except await timeout, which needs support from the shared core.

Fix error handling, now it correctly propagates errors.
Add random + headers in context.

Fix #2
